subject: Science
title: Will Humans Reach Mars?
description: Learn Will Humans Reach Mars? in one minute.

hook.text: Mars is the next target for human exploration. Getting there takes about seven months.

buildup.text: Astronauts would face radiation, muscle loss, and total isolation for years.

discovery.text: Mars has ice at its poles that could be converted into water and rocket fuel.

twist.text: The real challenge isn't getting there â€” it's surviving the two-year wait for a return window.

climax.text: Multiple space agencies and private companies are racing to send humans by the 2030s.

punchline.text: Mars is close enough to dream about and hard enough to fear.

quiz.question: What is the biggest challenge of a Mars mission?
options: Surviving the long duration and return wait
